privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use and protect your personal data.
privacy.intro: FIVE Consulting values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We may collect personal information such as name, email, phone number and professional data voluntarily provided by you when contacting us or subscribing to our newsletter.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use your information to answer inquiries, send relevant content, provide contracted services, improve user experience and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not share your information with third parties, except when necessary for service execution or required by law.

security.title: 4. Information Security
security.description: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, destruction, loss or alteration.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your website experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences in our consent banner.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.description: According to data protection laws, you have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data. To do so, contact us at contact@fiveconsulting.com.br.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This policy may be updated periodically. The most recent version will always be available on this page.
